p.codeblock: Future<void> loadExtensionProvider( {required String path, bool unloadAfterUse = false});
public abstract int LoadExtensionProvider(string path, bool unload_after_use = false);

section.p: This method adds external SDK extensions (such as Marketplace extensions and SDK extension plugins) to the SDK.
This method adds external SDK plugins (such as marketplace plugins and SDK extension plugins) to the SDK.
This method adds external SDK extensions (such as marketplace or SDK extension plugins) into the SDK.
This method adds external SDK extensions (such as Marketplace extensions and SDK extension plugins) to the SDK.
section.note: To load multiple extensions, call this method multiple times. This method is only supported on Windows.
To load multiple plugins, call this method multiple times. This method is for Android only.
To load multiple extensions, call this method multiple times. This method is available only on Windows and Android.
To load multiple extensions, call this method multiple times. This method applies to Windows and Android only.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Call this method immediately after initializing .
Call this method immediately after initializing .
Call this method immediately after initializing .
Call this method immediately after initializing .

plentry.pd: Path and name of the extension dynamic library. For example: /library/libagora_segmentation_extension.dll.

Whether to automatically unload the extension after use:
: Automatically unloads the extension when is destroyed.
: Does not automatically unload the extension until the process exits (recommended).
The path and name of the plugin dynamic library. For example: /library/libagora_segmentation_extension.dll.

Whether to automatically unload the plugin after use:
: Automatically unloads the plugin when is destroyed.
: Does not automatically unload the plugin until the process exits (recommended).
The path and name of the extension dynamic library. For example: /library/libagora_segmentation_extension.dll.

Whether to automatically unload the extension after use:
: Automatically unloads the extension when is destroyed.
: Does not automatically unload the extension until the process exits (recommended).
The path and name of the extension dynamic library. For example: /library/libagora_segmentation_extension.dll.

Whether to automatically unload the extension after use:
: Automatically unloads the extension when is destroyed.
: Does not automatically unload the extension until the process exits (recommended).

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
